channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Alt Carbon scores $12M seed to scale carbon removal in India
item.description: From a struggling family tea estate to an innovative climate venture, Alt Carbon has raised $12 million in a seed round as it plans to scale its carbo...

item.title: Strava is buying up athletic training apps – first Runna, and now The Breakaway
item.description: The social fitness app Strava has made two acquisitions over the last month and change: on Thursday, Strava’s acquired cycling app The Breakaway, foll...

item.title: OpenAI’s next big bet won’t be a wearable: report
item.description: OpenAI pushed generative AI into the public consciousness. Now, it could be developing a very different kind of AI device. According to a WSJ report, ...

item.title: Signal’s new Windows update prevents the system from capturing screenshots of chats
item.description: Signal said today that it is updating its Windows app to prevent the system from capturing screenshots, thereby protecting the content that is on disp...

item.title: LG’s Blazingly Brilliant G5 OLED Is the Pacesetter for Best TV of the Year
item.description: LG’s innovative new flagship OLED levels up the brightness for picture perfection.

item.title: Who’s to Blame When AI Agents Screw Up?
item.description: As Google and Microsoft push agentic AI systems, the kinks are still being worked on how agents interact with each other—and intersect with the law.

item.title: The Best Dyson Vacuums (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Feeling the pull of a clean machine? We’ll help you make sense of Dyson’s whirlwind vacuum lineup.

item.title: 18 Best Toiletry Bags, Tested Over Many Miles (2025)
item.description: Our team evaluated a ton of toiletry bags to find the best storage, organization, and design options for all your essentials.

item.title: 4 days left: Up to $900 off your ticket and 90% off for your +1 at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025

item.title: Politico’s Newsroom Is Starting a Legal Battle With Management Over AI
item.description: Politico has rules about AI in the newsroom. Staffers say those rules have been violated—and they’re gearing up for a fight.
